item.description: OK-We've decided to change the venue for the next meeting from the Scarlet Tavern to The East Bay Grill in Plymouth. They have a patio area with a bar and tables and if we're lucky, there may even a band will be playing! So be sure to stop by and bring a friend! I will have a Meet Up sign on the table ut if you can't find us, call me on my cell phone 847-361-8851. Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Meet Up Sign on the table or call me...

group.name: South Shore Graphic Designers, Writers & Web Folks

item.name: East Bay Grill
